description.brazilian: Complete o jogo como detetive
description.english: Complete the game as a detective
description.japanese: 探偵としてゲームをクリア
description.schinese: 成为一名侦探并完成游戏
description.tchinese: 成為一名偵探並完成遊戲

description.brazilian: Complete o jogo como jornalista
description.english: Complete the game as a journalist
description.japanese: ジャーナリストとしてゲームをクリア
description.schinese: 成为一名记者并完成游戏
description.tchinese: 成為一名記者並完成遊戲

description.brazilian: Encontre os suspeitos antes das entrevistas policiais
description.english: Find the suspects earlier police interviews
description.japanese: 警察の会見より先に容疑者を見つける
description.russian: Найти подозреваемых до их допроса в полиции
description.schinese: 尽早找到嫌疑犯接受警方调查
description.tchinese: 儘早找到嫌疑犯接受警方調查

description.brazilian: Arya revelou detalhes do crime que ela não teria conhecido
description.english: Arya to revealed details of the crime that she wouldn't have known
description.japanese: アリヤが本来知らないはずの犯罪の詳細を言ってしまう
description.russian: Арья раскрыла детали преступления, о котором она не узнала бы
description.schinese: 雅利娅透露了她不知道的犯罪细节
description.tchinese: 雅利婭透露了她不知道的犯罪細節

description.brazilian: Rex revelou detalhes do crime que ele não teria conhecido
description.english: Rex to revealed details of the crime that he wouldn't have known
description.japanese: レックスが本来知らないはずの犯罪の詳細を言ってしまう
description.russian: Рекс раскрыл детали преступления, о котором он не узнал бы
description.schinese: 雷克斯透露了他不知道的犯罪细节
description.tchinese: 雷克斯透露了他不知道的犯罪細節

description.brazilian: Mina revelou detalhes do crime que ela não teria conhecido
description.english: Mina to revealed details of the crime that she wouldn't have known
description.japanese: ミーナが本来知らないはずの犯罪の詳細を言ってしまう
description.russian: Мина раскрыла детали преступления, о котором она не узнала бы
description.schinese: 米娜透露了她不知道的犯罪细节
description.tchinese: 米娜透露了她不知道的犯罪細節

description.brazilian: Você recebe o cartão Diva da TRM
description.english: You are dealt the Diva card by TRM
description.japanese: TRMによりディーヴァのカードが配られる
description.schinese: TRM给你发了张主角卡
description.tchinese: TRM給你發了張主角卡

description.brazilian: Você recebe o cartão de ídolo da TRM
description.english: You are dealt the Idol card by TRM
description.japanese: TRMによりアイドルのカードが配られる
description.schinese: TRM给你发了张偶像卡
description.tchinese: TRM給你發了張偶像卡

description.brazilian: Você recebe o cartão Tycoon da TRM
description.english: You are dealt the Tycoon card by TRM
description.japanese: TRMにより大君のカードが配られる
description.schinese: TRM给你发了张大亨卡
description.tchinese: TRM給你發了張大亨卡

description.brazilian: Você recebe o cartão de Artista da TRM
description.english: You are dealt the Artist card by TRM
description.japanese: TRMにより芸術家のカードが配られる
description.schinese: TRM给你发了张艺术家卡
description.tchinese: TRM給你發了張藝術家卡

description.brazilian: Concluiu a investigação preliminar
description.english: Completed the preliminary investigation
description.japanese: 準備調査が完了する
description.schinese: 完成初步调查
description.tchinese: 完成初步調查

description.brazilian: Descubra evidências de Arya fingindo ser uma musa de Aluren
description.english: Discover evidence of Arya faking as an Aluren Muse
description.japanese: アリヤが偽物のアルーレンミューズである証拠を見つける
description.russian: Откройте доказательство того, что Арья притворяется Музой Алурен
description.schinese: 找出雅利娅假扮Aluren Muse的证据
description.tchinese: 找出雅利婭假扮Aluren 謬思的證據

description.brazilian: Descubra evidências de Rex promovendo um esquema de pirâmide óbvio
description.english: Discover evidence of Rex promoting an obvious pyramid scheme
description.japanese: レックスがネズミ講を実施している明らかな証拠を見つける
description.russian: Откройте доказательство того, что Рекс раскручивает явную схему пирамиды
description.schinese: 找出雷克斯推行金字塔骗局的证据
description.tchinese: 找出雷克斯推行金字塔傳銷騙局的證據

description.brazilian: Descubra evidências de Mina mentindo sobre sua tragédia
description.english: Discover evidence of Mina lying about her tragedy
description.japanese: ミーナが自分の悲劇について嘘をついている証拠を見つける
description.russian: Откройте доказательство того, что Мина лжет о своей трагедии
description.schinese: 找出米娜隐瞒她悲惨遭遇的的证据
description.tchinese: 找出米娜隱瞞她悲慘遭遇的的證據

description.brazilian: Recupere o totem da academia de Maya
description.english: Recover the totem from Maya's gym
description.japanese: マヤのジムからトーテムを奪回する
description.schinese: 从玛雅的健身房找回图腾
description.tchinese: 從瑪雅的健身房找回圖騰

description.brazilian: Recuperou o atolador de telefone das evidências da polícia
description.english: Recovered the phone jammer from police evidence
description.japanese: 警察の証拠から通話妨害電波を見つける
description.russian: Возвращена "глушилка" телефонов из отдела улик в полиции
description.schinese: 从警方的证据中找到了电话干扰器
description.tchinese: 從警方的證據中找到了電話干擾器

description.brazilian: Adquiriu o aplicativo K-remote da Ruben
description.english: Acquired the K-remote app from Ruben
description.japanese: ルベンからKリモートアプリを入手する
description.schinese: 从鲁本那里获得了K-remote应用程序
description.tchinese: 從魯本那裡獲得了K-remote應用程式

description.brazilian: Arya, Mina e Rex concordam em derrotar o Rippleman
description.english: Arya, Mina and Rex agrees to defeat the Rippleman
description.japanese: アリヤ、ミーナ、レックスがリップルマンを倒すことに賛成する
description.russian: Арья, Мина и Рекс соглашаются победить Рипплмэна
description.schinese: 雅利娅，米娜和雷克斯同意对抗涟漪人
description.tchinese: 雅利婭，米娜和雷克斯同意對抗漣漪人

description.brazilian: Sentindo-se injustiçada e humilhada, Arya aceitou o acordo do Rippleman e se tornou sua última vítima.
description.english: Feeling wronged and humiliated, Arya took the Rippleman's deal and became its latest victim.
description.japanese: ひどい扱いを受け屈辱であると感じたアリヤはリップルマンの取引に応じ、その新たな犠牲者となる
description.russian: Чувствуя себя обиженной и униженной, Арья заключила сделку с Рипплмэном и стала его последней жертвой.
description.schinese: 由于感到委屈和羞辱，雅利娅接受了涟漪人的交易，成为其最新受害者。
description.tchinese: 由於感到委屈和羞辱，雅利婭接受了漣漪人的交易，成為其最新受害者。

displayName.japanese: レックスが最高になる

description.brazilian: Por medo e desespero, Rex aceitou o acordo do Rippleman e se tornou sua última vítima.
description.english: Out of fear and desperation, Rex took the Rippleman's deal and became its latest victim.
description.japanese: 恐怖と絶望からレックスはリップルマンの取引に応じ、その新たな犠牲者となる
description.russian: Из страха и отчаяния Рекс заключил сделку с Рипплмэном и стал его последней жертвой.
description.schinese: 出于恐惧和绝望，雷克斯接受了涟漪人的交易，成为其最新受害者。
description.tchinese: 出於恐懼和絕望，雷克斯接受了漣漪人的交易，成為其最新受害者。

description.brazilian: Depois de se sentir traída por seus próprios amigos, Mina aceitou o acordo do Rippleman e se tornou sua última vítima.
description.english: After feeling betrayed by her own friends, Mina took the Rippleman's deal and became its latest victim.
description.japanese: 友達に裏切られたと感じたミーナはリップルマンの取引に応じ、その新たな犠牲者となる
description.russian: Почувствовав себя преданной друзьями, Мина заключила сделку Рипплмэном и стала его последней жертвой.
description.schinese: 在感觉被自己的朋友背叛后，米娜接受了涟漪人的交易，成为其最新受害者。
description.tchinese: 在感覺被自己的朋友背叛後，米娜接受了漣漪人的交易，成為其最新受害者。

description.brazilian: Derrotou o Rippleman
description.english: Defeated the Rippleman
description.japanese: リップルマンを倒す
description.schinese: 击败涟漪人
description.tchinese: 擊敗漣漪人

description.brazilian: Ligue para os serviços de emergência
description.english: Call the emergency services
description.japanese: 緊急サービスに電話する
description.schinese: 呼叫紧急服务
description.tchinese: 呼叫緊急服務

description.brazilian: Você deduz quem aceitou o acordo do Rippleman
description.english: You deduce who took the Rippleman's deal
description.japanese: リップルマンの取引に応じた人を推理する
description.russian: Методом дедукции вы приходите к выводу, кто заключил сделку с Рипплмэном
description.schinese: 你推断出是谁接受了涟漪人的交易
description.tchinese: 你推斷出是誰接受了漣漪人的交易

description.brazilian: Revelou o culpado
description.english: Revealed the culprit
description.japanese: 犯人を特定する
description.schinese: 揭发罪犯
description.tchinese: 揭發罪犯

description.brazilian: Esconda a verdade de Murilo
description.english: Hide the truth from Murilo
description.japanese: ムリーロに真実を話さない
description.schinese: 向穆里奥隐瞒真相
description.tchinese: 向穆里奧隱瞞真相

description.brazilian: Revele a verdade para Murilo
description.english: Reveal the truth to Murilo
description.japanese: ムリーロに真実を話す
description.schinese: 向穆里奥揭示真相
description.tchinese: 向穆里奧揭示真相
